docs.lead_paragraph: ALBANY, Feb. 13--Following is the text of Mayor William O'Dwyer's statement before the Legislative fiscal committees today, together with a digest of Controller Lazarus Joseph's statement and a memorandum submitted to the committee by John E. Burton, director of the State budget:

headline.main: Testimony on New York City's Requests for Aid at the State Budget Hearing in Albany

docs.abstract: text of O'Dwyer testimony; excerpts from Joseph testimony; Burton memo text
